I Semester

				Foundation Course-Language I 
				Foundation Course-English I 
				Core I-Prog in C 
				Core II-Prog in C (Practical) 
				Allied I-Mathematics I 
				Soft Skills - Essential of Language and 
				communication - Level I 
				Non-major Elective 

II Semester

				Foundation Course-Language II 
				Foundation Course-English II 
				Core I-Digital Electronics and Micro Processor 
				Core II-Digital Electronics and Micro Processor(Practical) 
				Allied II-Mathematics II 
				Soft Skills - Essentials of Language and 
				Communication - Level II 
				Non-major Elective
